languages.text: "Ксенос среди людей... пригласить ее к себе все равно что пригреть змею на груди".
"A xenos among humans. Inviting her to join us is like clasping a serpent to your bosom."
languages.original_text: "Ксенос среди людей... пригласить ее к себе все равно что пригреть змею на груди".

traits.locale_text: "A xenos among humans. Inviting her to join us is like clasping a serpent to your bosom."
traits.speaker: ArgentaCompanion

traits.locale_text: "A xenos among humans. Inviting her to join us is like clasping a serpent to your bosom."

traits.locale_text: "A xenos among humans. Inviting her to join us is like clasping a serpent to your bosom."
traits.speaker: ArgentaCompanion

traits.locale_text: "A xenos among humans. Inviting her to join us is like clasping a serpent to your bosom."
traits.speaker: ArgentaCompanion

languages.text: “身处人类之中的异形。邀请她加入我们，就像把毒蛇抱在怀里一样。”
languages.original_text: "A xenos among humans. Inviting her to join us is like clasping a serpent to your bosom."

traits.locale_text: “身处人类之中的异形。邀请她加入我们，就像把毒蛇抱在怀里一样。”
traits.speaker: ArgentaCompanion

languages.text: « Une xénos parmi les humains... L'inviter à nous rejoindre, c'est comme présenter son derrière à un serpent sur le point de frapper. »
languages.original_text: "A xenos among humans. Inviting her to join us is like clasping a serpent to your bosom."

traits.locale_text: « Une xénos parmi les humains... L'inviter à nous rejoindre, c'est comme présenter son derrière à un serpent sur le point de frapper. »
traits.speaker: ArgentaCompanion

languages.text: «Una xenos entre humanos. Invitarla a que nos acompañe es como abrazar a una serpiente contra nuestro pecho».
languages.original_text: "A xenos among humans. Inviting her to join us is like clasping a serpent to your bosom."

traits.locale_text: «Una xenos entre humanos. Invitarla a que nos acompañe es como abrazar a una serpiente contra nuestro pecho».
traits.speaker: ArgentaCompanion

languages.text: 「人間の中に異種族が1匹か。彼女を勧誘するとは、胸の中でヘビを抱くようなものだ」
languages.original_text: "A xenos among humans. Inviting her to join us is like clasping a serpent to your bosom."

traits.locale_text: 「人間の中に異種族が1匹か。彼女を勧誘するとは、胸の中でヘビを抱くようなものだ」
traits.speaker: ArgentaCompanion

languages.text: "Eine Xenos unter Menschen. Sie in unserer Mitte aufzunehmen, das ist, als würde man eine Schlange an seinem Busen nähren."
languages.original_text: "A xenos among humans. Inviting her to join us is like clasping a serpent to your bosom."

traits.locale_text: "Eine Xenos unter Menschen. Sie in unserer Mitte aufzunehmen, das ist, als würde man eine Schlange an seinem Busen nähren."
traits.speaker: ArgentaCompanion

languages.original_text: "A xenos among humans. Inviting her to join us is like clasping a serpent to your bosom."

languages.text: "İnsanlar, aralarına zeno alıyor. Ne günlere kaldık!.. Bize katılması hâlinde koynumuzda yılan besliyor olacağız."
languages.original_text: "A xenos among humans. Inviting her to join us is like clasping a serpent to your bosom."

traits.locale_text: "İnsanlar, aralarına zeno alıyor. Ne günlere kaldık!.. Bize katılması hâlinde koynumuzda yılan besliyor olacağız."
traits.speaker: ArgentaCompanion
